personal.name: Vinayak Raju Shinde
personal.title: AI Engineer | Data Scientist | Quantitative Researcher | Content Creator
personal.tagline: Building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems
personal.bio: Passionate AI Engineer and Data Scientist with expertise in building scalable machine learning systems, quantitative trading strategies, and GenAI applications. Currently working as Jr. AI Engineer at Bixware Technologies, developing cutting-edge LLM-powered solutions. Strong background in competitive programming (CodeForces 1154), quantitative research, and system design. Active hackathon participant with 20+ competitions under my belt. Creator of 'The Algorithmic Forge' YouTube channel, educating aspiring quants on algorithmic trading, ML, and Python.

achievements: Developed scalable chatbot using Gemini LLM, LangChain, VectorDB for information retrieval, and React frontend, reducing data retrieval time by 50% as measured by query latency benchmarks
Implemented multi-agent analysis for actionable insights in distributed systems
Built ELT/ETL pipelines with SQL, Pandas, and Databricks, enhancing real-time analytics for retail clients
Created comprehensive educational content on quantitative research, algorithmic trading, ML, Python, and robotics
Developed full playlist series on quantitative research methodologies and implementations
Teaching practical applications of machine learning in financial markets
Building community of aspiring quantitative researchers and algorithmic traders
Completed quantitative research simulation on Forage platform, analyzing loan book to estimate customer probability of default
Applied dynamic programming to convert FICO scores into categorical data for default prediction
Enhanced data analysis and predictive modeling skills using advanced Python in real-world banking context
Developed scalable WhatsApp bot with Flask APIs, boosting engagement by 35%
Designed CI/CD containerized ETL pipelines with Databricks, improving real-time analytics
Optimized GenAI NLP workflows, reducing latency by 40%
Guided 50+ students in AI-embedded robotics projects
Led IoT and biomimetic robot builds using Python and microcontrollers
Developed comprehensive curriculum for hands-on robotics education combining hardware and software

projects.title: Chikitsa: AI Mental Health Platform
projects.tagline: Privacy-preserving mental health support powered by cutting-edge AI
projects.description: Revolutionary mental health platform combining Facial Expression Recognition (FER) with advanced conversational AI to provide empathetic, personalized mental wellness support while maintaining complete user privacy.
projects.longDescription: Chikitsa AI is a groundbreaking platform that democratizes access to mental health support through artificial intelligence. The system uses real-time facial expression analysis to detect emotional states (96% accuracy), combined with an AI voice assistant for natural, empathetic interactions. Integrated humanities and psychiatry for contextual guidance. Gamified user behavior analysis using Gemini 2.5 and Gemma3n. All processing happens with privacy-first architecture, ensuring no personal data is stored.
achievements: Ranked Top 3 in Google GenAI Hackathon 2024 (38,000+ participants)
Achieved 96% accuracy in FER-based mood inference
Integrated humanities and psychiatry for contextual guidance
Gamified user behavior analysis using Gemini 2.5 and Gemma3n
projects.impact: Provides 24/7 accessible, judgment-free mental health support with zero-knowledge privacy architecture

projects.title: Synapse: AI Scheduling Assistant
projects.description: Innovative AI-powered scheduling assistant designed to autonomously coordinate meetings, resolve conflicts, and optimize calendar schedules using advanced Agentic AI.
projects.longDescription: Synapse is an intelligent scheduling assistant built for the AMD AI Hackathon that leverages advanced Agentic AI to streamline workplace productivity. The system autonomously coordinates meetings across multiple participants, intelligently resolves scheduling conflicts, and optimizes calendar arrangements to maximize productivity. By eliminating the inefficiencies of manual scheduling and endless email chains, Synapse saves hours of coordination time for teams and individuals.
achievements: Built for AMD AI Hackathon showcasing advanced Agentic AI capabilities
Autonomous conflict resolution with multi-participant coordination
Intelligent calendar optimization for maximum productivity
Seamless integration with existing calendar systems
projects.impact: Eliminates manual scheduling inefficiencies, saving teams hours of coordination time

projects.title: ML Momentum: Unsupervised Learning Trading Strategy
projects.tagline: Machine learning approach to algorithmic trading with exceptional alpha generation
projects.description: Advanced trading algorithms using technical indicators and unsupervised machine learning to build portfolios that significantly outperform benchmark indices with superior risk-adjusted returns.
projects.longDescription: Engineered a comprehensive quantitative trading system using advanced feature engineering and unsupervised learning techniques. The system calculates Garman-Klass volatility for accurate price movement estimation, applies RSI and Bollinger Bands for momentum analysis, and uses K-Means clustering to identify market regimes. Portfolio optimization through Efficient Frontier theory enables risk-adjusted returns that consistently outperform the Nifty-50 benchmark. Comprehensive backtesting across 85 months with 58 trading days demonstrates robust performance with a Sharpe ratio of 3.38.
achievements: Achieved 73.48% annual return vs. Nifty-50's 34.31% (39.17% outperformance)
Generated 17.44% total return compared to benchmark's 7.73% (9.71% alpha)
Attained exceptional Sharpe ratio of 3.38 vs. benchmark's 2.06
Maintained controlled volatility at 21.75% with max drawdown of -6.19%
Backtested across 85 months with 58 trading days for robust validation
Engineered features using Garman-Klass Volatility, RSI, and Bollinger Bands
Applied K-Means clustering for market regime identification
Built Efficient Frontier portfolios with optimal risk-return profiles
projects.impact: Demonstrates practical application of ML in quantitative finance with measurable alpha generation and superior risk-adjusted returns

projects.title: Volatility Curve Prediction (NK Securities HFT)
projects.description: Machine learning pipeline for implied volatility prediction in high-frequency trading environments, achieving industry-leading accuracy.
projects.longDescription: Developed a sophisticated quadratic Huber regression pipeline specifically designed for implied volatility prediction in HFT scenarios. The system implements advanced feature scaling, log transformations, and robust regression techniques to handle outliers. Achieved exceptional MSE of 0.000062497, demonstrating the model's precision in volatile market conditions. Ranked highly in NK Securities HFT competition against professional quants.
achievements: Achieved MSE: 0.000062497 in volatility prediction
Ranked highly in NK Securities HFT competition
Implemented feature scaling and log-transform optimizations
Built production-ready regression pipeline
projects.impact: Demonstrates ability to build production-grade quantitative models for financial markets

projects.title: Drishti: Smart Accessibility Glasses
projects.description: Innovative IoT project combining smart glasses, Raspberry Pi, and ML for real-time obstacle detection with voice navigation assistance and safety features.
projects.longDescription: Drishti revolutionizes accessibility through cutting-edge IoT technology. The system integrates smart glasses with a Raspberry Pi running computer vision models for real-time video analysis and obstacle identification. A voice assistant provides intuitive navigation guidance, while motion sensors detect immediate dangers and trigger customizable haptic feedback. Users can monitor system status and customize settings via a companion mobile app, ensuring enhanced mobility and safety for visually impaired individuals.
achievements: Real-time obstacle detection using computer vision and ML
Voice-guided navigation system for intuitive assistance
Motion sensors with customizable haptic feedback for danger alerts
Mobile app integration for status monitoring and configuration
projects.impact: Empowers visually impaired individuals with enhanced mobility and safety through intelligent technology

projects.title: Deep Residual Learning vs Deep Learning
projects.tagline: Comparative analysis of ResNet and traditional CNNs for image recognition
projects.description: Research project comparing Deep Residual Learning architectures with traditional deep learning approaches for image recognition tasks.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive comparative study analyzing the performance differences between Deep Residual Learning (ResNet) architectures and traditional Convolutional Neural Networks for image recognition. The project implements both architectures from scratch, benchmarks their performance on standard datasets, and provides detailed analysis of training dynamics, convergence rates, and final accuracy metrics. Demonstrates the advantages of skip connections in very deep networks and their impact on gradient flow.
achievements: Implemented ResNet and traditional CNN architectures from scratch
Comprehensive performance benchmarking on image datasets
Detailed analysis of training dynamics and convergence
Demonstrated benefits of residual connections in deep networks
projects.impact: Provides insights into architectural choices for deep learning practitioners

projects.title: LLM GPU Scheduler
projects.tagline: GPU-optimized resource allocation for LLM inference
projects.description: Intelligent GPU scheduling system for efficient LLM inference with ultra-low latency.
projects.longDescription: Developed an intelligent GPU resource allocation system specifically optimized for Large Language Model inference workloads. The scheduler dynamically manages GPU resources across multiple concurrent LLM requests, implementing advanced queuing strategies and memory management. Achieved 0.3-second average latency through careful optimization of GPU kernel launches, memory transfers, and batch processing strategies.
achievements: 1st Runner Up at AMDxSPRINT Hackathon
Achieved 0.3s average latency for LLM inference
Implemented dynamic GPU resource allocation
Optimized memory management for concurrent requests
projects.impact: Enables efficient scaling of LLM applications through intelligent resource management

projects.title: Bharat Browser
projects.description: Privacy-focused browser with AI-powered threat detection and prevention capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Developed an AI-driven cybersecurity browser solution that provides enhanced protection against modern cyber threats. The browser implements machine learning models for real-time threat detection, phishing prevention, and malicious script blocking. Includes privacy-enhancing features like advanced tracking prevention and secure DNS. Received MeitY (Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology) recognition for innovation in digital security.
achievements: Received MeitY National Recognition
Implemented AI-driven threat detection
Built privacy-enhancing features
Real-time phishing and malware prevention
projects.impact: Enhances digital security for users through intelligent threat prevention
